name: Rouge noir
description:
Short experience of a non euclidian game in unity. The only objective of this game is to raise diferent types of emotions, like confusion, happiness, calmness and joy.  We hope you like it. This was made in 3 weeks with the purpose of learning more about shaders and rendering in game dev.

PLEASE READ

If you have labyrinthitis or similar, please consider watching the complete youtube walkthrough instead (link at the end), since this game plays with perspective and other things that may cause sickness.

We hope you enjoy your experience. Consider playing the game yourself before watching the video

For those who like to make games, this project is completely open source, github here.
